img_above_text:
# Gray-Bronze Cart

Gray-Bronze Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.

## How to Find Gray-Bronze Cart

As you come outside of the cave, you'll need to go left and up a narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.

Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text introduces the "Gray-Bronze Cart," a Yaoguai Chief boss encountered at the start of Chapter 5 in *Black Myth: Wukong*. This boss blocks the pathway to the Ashen Pass II and is one of the Five Element Carts players must defeat in this chapter.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts a narrow, atmospheric pathway surrounded by towering, intricately carved stone pillars adorned with demonic or mythical faces. At the far end of the path, a dark, ominous figure or object (likely the Gray-Bronze Cart) is visible, blocking the way. The setting conveys a foreboding and challenging environment, aligning with the context of a boss fight.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text provides directions to locate the Gray-Bronze Cart, instructing players to exit a cave, turn left, and ascend a narrow path. At the end of this path, the cart obstructs progress, signaling the start of the encounter.
